title: The Weight of Knowing
timeline: 2880.079 - Day 37 (5 days after Ch12, 9 days before Magistrate deadline)

knows: Guild Masters tried to disclose truth multiple times over 40 years
Magistrate modeling always showed disclosure would kill billions
19 Guild Masters resigned, 12 transferred, 8 died from stress
Average Guild Master lifespan: 137 years vs normal 182 years
Ryn proposed truth disclosure multiple times, voted down
5 years ago Ryn prepared contingency: train investigators for controlled disclosure
Lira was identified and trained as contingency investigator
7 other operators trained across network as exit strategy
Ryn coming to meet, bringing personal logs spanning 40 years
Lira Voss.emotional_state: Profound understanding. Seeing guild as tragic figures, not villains. Realizing her investigation was contingency plan. Manipulation but also genuine burden-sharing. Need to talk to Ryn face-to-face. Carrying weight of impossible choices.

revealed_to_reader: Multiple disclosure attempts over 40 years, all voted down
Guild Masters dying from stress of deception
Lira trained as contingency investigator 5 years ago
Ryn's personal logs offered for review
chapter_purpose: Show guild tried to disclose truth repeatedly. Reveal Lira's investigation was contingency plan. Deepen sympathy for guild's impossible position. Set up Ryn confrontation.
